mapper.select:
/* AdminProduct - productList */ select p_code, p_name, p_inventory, p_color, p_size, to_char(p_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as p_date, p_gender, price.pr_01, smallcategory.smallct_category from product inner join price on product.pr_no = price.pr_no inner join smallcategory on product.smallct_no = smallcategory.smallct_no inner join bigcategory on product.smallct_no = smallcategory.smallct_no where p_status != 0
order by p_code desc
mapper.insert: /* AdminProduct - productInsert */ INSERT INTO PRODUCT (p_code, p_name, p_inventory, p_color, p_size, p_date, p_content, pr_no, p_gender, smallct_no, p_status) VALUES (#{p_code}, #{p_name}, #{p_inventory}, #{p_color}, #{p_size}, #{p_date}, #{p_content}, #{pr_no}, #{p_gender}, #{smallct_no}, 1)
mapper.select:

mapper.insert: /* adminProduct - imageInsert */ insert into image (img_no, p_code, img_image) values (image_seq.nextval, #{p_code}, #{img_image})
mapper.delete: /* adminProduct - productDelete */ delete from product where p_code = #{p_code}
mapper.update: /* adminProduct - statusUpdate */ update product set p_status = 0 where p_code = #{p_code}
